text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day of the Takamatsunomiya Kinen<n>has
come, and the stands are<n>overflowing with
enthusiastic fans<n>cheering for Fuji Kiseki.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm worried the pressure might be too<n>much for
her. In an attempt to reassure<n>me, Fuji Kiseki
smiles brightly...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And accidentally knocks a cup off a<n>table. It's not
like her to be so clumsy,<n>so I'm concerned about
this incident...
